column1: Hazro Tehsil is a tehsil of Attock District in the Punjab Province of Pakistan about 85km away from islamabad & 7km from GT road. Hazro city also connected to Islambad motorway through Chach Interchange. Hazro city is a trading hub for approximately 90 villages and spoken languages are hindko pashto and urdu english. It is newly created tehsil from parts of the NA-57 constituency of Attock with the capital of Hazro.

column2: the Minister of State for Environment
column3: Malik Amin Aslam announced that Rs150 million would be spent on the NA 57 area of Attock including remote areas of Hazro Tehsil for development.
